markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Aeon](/Traits.aspx?ID=208)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 345</row>

These monitors are the self-styled defenders of reality. Traditional aeons have dualistic natures and forms, and they hold a dichotomy of interests, though axiomites and inevitables do not. Aeons other than [axiomites](/Monsters.aspx?ID=7) and [inevitables](/Traits.aspx?ID=223) communicate via a strange telepathic hodgepodge of sensory sending called envisioning.
name: Aeon
